meta.title: Metalloid - Precision Component Manufacturing | Industrial Solutions
meta.description: Leading brass precision components manufacturer with 25 years of expertise, serving automotive, electric, and pneumatic industries nationwide.

cta.title: Ready to Get Started?

items.answer: We accommodate orders from small prototype runs to large-scale production, with flexible MOQ based on component complexity and specifications.
items.question: What are your minimum order quantities?

items.answer: Standard lead times range from 2-6 weeks depending on component complexity, with expedited options available for urgent requirements.
items.question: What are typical production lead times?

items.answer: We are ISO 9001:2015 certified with rigorous quality control processes, ensuring consistent precision and reliability across all manufacturing stages.
items.question: What quality certifications do you maintain?

items.answer: Yes, we specialize in custom precision component design with advanced laser marking and full engineering support throughout development.
items.question: Can you handle custom component designs?

items.answer: We primarily manufacture brass components with capabilities in various grades and specialized alloys for diverse industrial applications.
